description.narrative: Cambodia Climate Change Alliance (CCCA)

title.narrative: Mid Term Review Report of Cambodia Climate Change Alliance project
Mid-term Review of the Cambodia Climate Change Alliance Programme (CCCA Phase 2)

description.narrative: Cambodia Climate Change Alliance Phase 2

1. National M&E Framework is approved and functional including gender disaggregated and poverty indicators 2. Number of ministries with institutional arrangement to manage their Climate Change Action Plan (CCAP) and contribute to Climate Change Technical Team (CCTT) activities 3. Number of ministries that demonstrate capacity to implement at least 50% actions in their CCAPs and report on CCAP progress in line with national standards (incl. gender analysis) 4. Legal mandates for the National Climate Change Committee (NCCC), CCTT and NCCC secretariat strengthened

comment.narrative: Baseline 2013 1. A draft M&E Framework is under discussion 2. 2 3. 0 4. Institutional and legal review is on-going

1. Climate Change M&E framework contributes to NSDP mid-term review
2. 5 ministries with institutional arrangement to manage their Climate Change Action Plan (CCAP) and contribute to Climate Change Technical Team (CCTT) activities
3. New royal decree and sub decree adopted

People with disability have increased opportunities for participation in social, economic, cultural, and political life through effective implementation of the National Disability Strategic Plan(NDSP)

title.narrative: Disability Right Initiative Mid Term Review

description.narrative: Increase interaction and accountability of elected bodies and authorities to citizens through strengthened democratic processes at the national and sub-national levels.
Human rights affairs
Supporting Government implementation of the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities
Human rights affairs
Supporting Disabled Peoples Organisations to raise the voice and protect the rights of people with disability
Human rights affairs

1. No. of advocacy strategies developed, based on strong evidence and implemented to influence government ministry and institution to develop disability inclusive policies 2. No. of persons with diverse disabilities, including women have increased participation in democratic processes 3. No. of advocacy strategies developed & implemented to influence key ministries to improve the implementation of disability law and UNCRPD on access to information, public accessibility, and access to employment 4. Increased awareness about the United Nations Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCRPD) demonstrated by the general public 5. Increased awareness on disability rights & issues among targeted groups (general public, NGOs, government ministries, persons with disabilities, private sector, and Disabled People Organizations (DPOs)) 6. Increased awareness about UNCRPD among DPOs, key relevant ministries, disability NGOs and CSOs

comment.narrative: There is no data available for baseline.

1. Disability inclusive policy implemented by NEC to ensure persons with disabilities enable to vote. 2. Voting registration identified the types of persons with disabilities for those who have registered. 3. Women with disabilities at leadership level increased to match the 50/50 gender policy within DPOs 5. Shadow report of UNCRPD drafted 6. CDPO membership database disaggregated by type & location of entity

description.narrative: Supporting DPOs to raise the voice and protect the rights of people with disability (NGO component) through CDPO.

description.narrative: The project aims to propose statutory changes and implementation framework for an Environmental Code, an enabling legal framework to achieve sustainable development in Cambodia through a series of legal and ecosystem analyses.

participating-org.narrative: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

description.narrative: Main outputs include 1) overarching principles and objectives for the Code 2) jurisdictional analyses 3) creation of a nationwide integrated ecosystem mapping and 4) an initial proposal for statutory changes and implementation framework for the Code.

title.narrative: Clearing for Results III- Mine Action for Human Dev't

description.narrative: Seeks to achieve 2 results: Contracting of mine action services to deliver 13 percentage of the total mine ERW contaminated areas impact free, and Establish a mine action programme performance monitoring system that measures human development outcomes.
